sentences.en: And he took another gentle little pinch of snuff , and lightly crossed his legs.
sentences.cn: 他又吸了一小撮鼻烟, 把一条腿轻轻地搁在另一条腿上.

sentences.en: Chewing tobacco and snuff not allowed in the plant.
sentences.cn: 在厂房内不许嚼和吸食烟草.

sentences.en: He thought he was about to snuff it.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己快要咽气了。

sentences.en: He took a pinch of snuff .
I'm not feeling up to snuff today.
Inside painting snuff bottle a traditional Chinese folk art.
sentences.cn: 内画鼻烟壶是我国传统的民间工艺.

sentences.en: Red Man snuff should break even this year, the CEO said.
sentences.cn: 首席执行官说,红人鼻烟今年将收支相抵.

sentences.en: Similar traditional verses are sometimes found on hope chests , jewel boxes , snuff boxes, and the like.
sentences.cn: 相似的铭文有时还会出现在女子的化妆盒 、 珠宝盒 、 鼻烟盒和诸如此类的玩艺上.

sentences.en: Snuff is Swedish Match's main earnings generator and most profitable product.
sentences.cn: 鼻烟是瑞典火柴的主要盈利来源和最盈利的产品.

sentences.en: The art of decorating snuff bottles from the inside originated in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 内画壶是鼻烟壶的一种.内画技艺起源于北京.

sentences.en: The recent rebound in mortgage rates could snuff out the housing recovery.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率最近的回升可能会扼杀房地产的复苏。

sentences.en: They had orders to snuff out the enemy guards.
sentences.cn: 他们接到了杀掉敌卫兵的命令.

sentences.en: they need a million dollars to get their facilities up to snuff.
sentences.cn: 他们需要100万美元才能使设备合乎标准。

sentences.en: To understand China it is a must to know Chinese snuff bottles.
sentences.cn: 要了解中国,不可不知中国的内画壶.

sentences.en: Today , snuff - bottle pictures fall into three different categories -- the Jing ( Beijing ) , Ji ( Hebei ) and Lu ( Shandong ).
sentences.cn: 我国的内画技艺主要分为 京派 、 冀 派、鲁派三大派.

sentences.en: You'll snuff out one day if you're so careless.
sentences.cn: 你老是这么粗心早晚有一天会送命的.

sentences.en: You've got the power. You can do anything you want. You can snuff him out or not.
sentences.cn: 你已经大权在握，可以为所欲为了。你可以灭了他，也可以不这么做。

words.tran_cn: 海豚；吸鼻烟者；以鼻吸表示轻视者

phrases.tran_cn: 精明的；状况良好的；正常的

phrases.phrase: up to snuff informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 符合标准的；符合要求的

trans.tran_en: a type of tobacco in powder form, which people breathe in through their noses
to stop a  candle  burning by pressing the burning part with your fingers or by covering it

trans.tran_cn: 死去，熄灭（火焰），（伤风鼻阻时）呼呼地吸（气），吸入，闻，嗅
剪（烛）花，扑灭，熄灭（烛光），消灭，扼杀，嗅
